nodes.snippet: There are at least 25,772,342 illegal aliens, not the 11,000,000 that have been reported for years, in our Country.

According to Pew, the number of immigrants in the U.S. illegally had reached a height of 12.2 million in 2007, representing about 4 percent of the U.S. population, before declining in part because of a weakening U.S. economy.. .
There are at least 25,772,342 illegal aliens, not the 11,000,000 that have been reported for years, in our Country.
